sentences.en: Already, both sides are jockeying to belittle the other side.
sentences.cn: 双方已经在使出浑身解数贬低对方了。

sentences.en: Food production has already fallen behind the population growth.
sentences.cn: 粮食生产已经跟不上人口增长。

sentences.en: He is already getting in trim for the big day.
sentences.cn: 他已经在为那个重要的日子调整状态了。

sentences.en: He was already asleep in the bed, which smelled faintly of mildew.
sentences.cn: 他已经在略带霉味的床上睡着了。

sentences.en: His proposals have already been rebuffed by the Prime Minister.
sentences.cn: 他的提议已经被首相否决了。

sentences.en: The caterers were already laying out the tables for lunch.
sentences.cn: 负责餐饮的人已经在为午餐摆桌了。

sentences.en: The country's politicians are already heaving a collective sigh of relief.
sentences.cn: 该国的政界人士均已松了口气。

sentences.en: The design of the new house is similar to those that have already been built.
sentences.cn: 新房的设计与那些已建好的房子相似。

sentences.en: The grand design of Europe's monetary union is already agreed.
sentences.cn: 欧洲统一货币的宏伟构想已经获得认同。

sentences.en: The knee's coming on fine, I'm walking comfortably already.
sentences.cn: 膝盖恢复得很好，我现在走路已经不疼了。

sentences.en: The manuscript had already been sent off to the printers.
sentences.cn: 原稿已经寄给印刷厂了。

sentences.en: The material consisted only of already published, unclassified information.
sentences.cn: 这份材料里只有一些已公开的、非保密性质的信息。

sentences.en: The performance had already started when we arrived.
sentences.cn: 我们到达时表演已经开始了。

sentences.en: The survey claims loan companies prey on weak families already in debt.
sentences.cn: 这项调查声称信贷公司专对那些已经负债的弱势家庭下手。

sentences.en: Their own lives already seemed to possess the symmetries of narrative art.
sentences.cn: 他们自己的生活似乎已经拥有叙事艺术的对称性。

sentences.en: These ceremonies were already part of pre-Christian ritual in Mexico.
sentences.cn: 这些仪式已经成为墨西哥基督教时期以前的宗教仪式的一部分。

sentences.en: Two out of every three Britons already own a video recorder.
sentences.cn: 每3个英国人中就有两个已经有了录像机。

sentences.en: We got there early but Mike had already left.
sentences.cn: 我们及早到了那里，但是迈克已经离开了。

trans.tran_en: before now, or before a particular time
